HeroSectionData.title: Transforming Concepts into Seamless User Experiences
HeroSectionData.whoIAm: Hi i'm Yahya, a Next.js Frontend Developer based in Egypt.
HeroSectionData.offlineText: Come Back Online to complete browsing.

box1.title: I prioritize collaboration and clear communication to build great web solutions.

box3.title: Do you want to start a project together?

stage1.title: Initial Consultation
stage1.description: We start with a comprehensive discussion to understand your goals, requirements, and vision for the project. This step ensures that we are aligned and can create a roadmap for success.

stage2.title: Design and Development
stage2.description: During this phase, we create wireframes and prototypes, then develop the website. Throughout, we maintain open communication, provide regular updates, and seek your feedback to keep the project on track.

stage3.title: Review and Launch
stage3.description: In the final step, we conduct thorough testing and make any necessary adjustments based on your feedback. Once everything is approved, we launch your website, ensuring a smooth and successful deployment.

ContactSectionData.smallText: Reach me out and let's turn all your ideas into reality together.
